snippet.title: "Endless Casual Drive" Promotional video Released! Steam Page Released!
snippet.description:
Game name: Endless Casual Drive 
Game Type: Simulation, Casual

This is an immersive leisure solo journey. All you have to do is focus on driving and enjoy driving. Slowly gain peace and return to yourself in the white noise brought by the engine and the environment.

Search on Steam and add wishlist to let me like it.
